creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John M. and Janet B. McKelvey
description: bowl with white ground painted in repeating black geometric pattern (rain patterns); rim curves inward towards the interior of the bowl; base of bowl is painted with washed orange pigment with dark smoke stains; interior of bowls has visible tool marks from the creation process;
markings: Signed JL on base with Acoma N. Mex written beneath
title: Acoma Bowl
